The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Just a reminder of the main dates to be aware of in the coming month.
Dates for your diary in November
2nd (Y1-5 Initial reports/ Y6-10 Interim reports)
9th Y1A Class Assembly (9:30) / Photography competition ends
13th ASAs end
14th ASAs end/ Y2-3 Golf begins
15th Y4A Class Assembly (2:35)
16th Y1B Class Assembly (9:30)
20th PTCs Y1-9
21st PTCs Y1-9
22nd Y4B Class Assembly (2:35)
23rd Y1C Class Assembly (9:30)
23rd Foundation Stage Initial reports issued
28th LC Music Recital
29th UC Music Recital/ Y4C Assembly (2:35)
Reports Y1-10
Initial reports will be sent home with the students this Friday. They are an initial report with main objective of identifying progress being made at an early stage. More detailed curriculum reports will follow later in the year as more work is produced. Do be aware that parent/teacher consultations will follow (see dates above) once After School Activities Programme for this term has been completed. Opportunities to set up appointments will follow on from the reports.
Remembrance Day
We will be offering the opportunity to commemorate those who died in conflict from all nations by selling poppies on the Upper Campus from next week. Students/parents may make a voluntary contribution to the appeal and purchase a poppy to wear at school. Please use the link below to gain further information on how the funds raised will be used.
www.britishlegion.org.uk/support-us/
Spring term invoices
Spring term invoices will be sent out on Friday, November 16. If you need to receive the invoice earlier in order to meet the payment deadline (December 15) please contact Marina Urmanova, our Invoicing Manager, at isminvoicing@britishschools.co.uk.
Swimming pool
If you, your nannies or drivers would like to help your child(ren) get ready before and after swimming lessons or during the Swimming Gala, please note that you do NOT need to order a pass in advance. Just let the security at the swimming pool know that you are from ISM.
Best regards,
Admissions Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
